gap_analysis.gap_bridging_strategy: Focus first on strengthening frontend architecture skills through React advanced patterns and component design. Then expand into microservices architecture while maintaining ML knowledge as a differential advantage.

system_design.evidence: Successfully built scalable data pipelines and increased ETL throughput by 40%
system_design.development_path: Take distributed systems design courses and document architecture decisions

technical_leadership.evidence: Led implementation of CI/CD pipelines and complex data infrastructure
technical_leadership.development_path: Seek opportunities to mentor junior developers and lead architecture discussions

environment_capabilities.reasoning: Strong evidence of cloud-native development with AWS services, containerization expertise, and full-stack capabilities shown through Python backend and React frontend work

project_briefs.title: Full-Stack ML Feature Store
project_briefs.description: Build a React-based UI for managing ML feature definitions with a Python FastAPI backend and containerized deployment
project_briefs.impact_on_gaps: Bridges frontend architecture and microservices gaps while leveraging existing ML knowledge

multi_perspective_insights.hiring_manager_view: Strong technical foundation with proven delivery, but needs to demonstrate more frontend architecture experience for full-stack role
multi_perspective_insights.architect_view: Solid cloud-native and backend skills, opportunity to deepen frontend architectural patterns and microservices design
multi_perspective_insights.coach_view: Excellent transition candidate with transferable skills - focus on connecting data engineering patterns to frontend architecture

3_month_goals: Contribute to open source React project
action_plan.long_term_vision: Grow into Full-Stack Technical Lead role combining data engineering background with frontend architecture expertise
